dataUpload.title: Data Upload
dataUpload.description: Upload and manage your Glooko export files with drag-and-drop support

uploadZone.dropFilesPrompt: Drop ZIP files here or click to browse
uploadZone.uploadDescription: Upload one or multiple ZIP files from Glooko export

demoData.title: Try Demo Data
demoData.description1: Start by exploring the app with our demo datasets. A pre-loaded demo file is already available in the file list below.
demoData.description2: You can also load additional demo datasets by clicking the
demoData.description3: button in the file list header. These datasets are inspired by real-world Type 1 Diabetes data patterns.
demoData.description4: For attribution and more information about the demo data source, visit the

privacy.title: Your Privacy is Protected
privacy.dataStaysLocal: Your data never leaves your device.
privacy.description1: All graph processing and analysis happens entirely in your browser. We do not upload your files to any server.
privacy.description2: Files are maintained only in your browser's memory while you use the app. When you close the browser tab, your data is gone—unless you explicitly save it.
privacy.description3: For AI-powered analysis, data handling is different. See the

upload.title: Upload Your Data
upload.description1: your Glooko export ZIP files into the upload zone above, or click to browse and select files from your computer.
upload.description2: Once uploaded, select a file from the list to view it in the
upload.description3: page—including BG Overview, Daily BG charts, and Hypoglycemia analysis.
upload.description4: You can also export your data to Excel format (XLSX) using the download button next to each file.

aiAnalysis.title: AI Analysis (Data Leaves Your Device)
aiAnalysis.description1: When you use AI-powered analysis features, your health data is sent to the selected AI provider (Perplexity, Grok, DeepSeek, or Google Gemini).
aiAnalysis.description3: (such as your name or email), but the AI provider may associate your API key with the health data you send.
aiAnalysis.description4: For detailed information about AI data handling, security best practices, and privacy policies, visit the

fileList.title: Uploaded Files
fileList.noFiles: No files uploaded yet. Upload ZIP files to get started.
